00002 /**
00003  * show a "internal server error" page. if you want your own: put it in views/layouts/error.thtml
00004  *
00005  * @package kata
00006  * @author mnt
00007  */

00009 $minidump= basename($e->getFile()).':'.$e->getLine().' '.$e->getMessage();
00010 $cnt= 1;
00011 foreach ($e->getTrace() as $trace) {
00012              if (isset($trace['file']) && (basename($trace['file']) == 'dispatcher.php')) { break; }
00013 
00014              $minidump.="\n";
00015 
00016              if (isset ($trace['file'])) {
00017                           $minidump .= basename($trace['file']).':'.$trace['line'].' ';
00018              }
00019              if (isset ($trace['class'])) {
00020                           $minidump .= $trace['class'].(isset($trace['type'])?$trace['type']:'::');
00021              }
00022              $minidump .= $trace['function'].'(';
00023              if (isset ($trace['args'])) {
00024                           foreach ($trace['args'] as $id => $arg) {
00025                                        $minidump .= $id.'=\'';
00026                                        $minidump .= (is_object($arg) ? get_class($arg) : $arg).'\' ';
00027                           }
00028                           $minidump= substr($minidump, 0, -1);
00029              }
00030              $minidump .= ")";
00031 
00032              $cnt++;
00033              if ($cnt > 4) {
00034                           break;
00035              }
00036 }
00037 
00038 if (DEBUG < 1) {
00039 
00040              echo '<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//IETF//DTD HTML 2.0//EN">
00041                           <html><head>
00042                           <title>400 Bad Request</title>
00043                           </head><body>
00044                           <h1>Bad Request</h1>
00045                           <p>The request could not be understood by the server.</p>
00046                           </body></html>';

00056 <h1>Framework Exception</h1>

00060              $traceArray= $e->getTrace();
00061 
00062              function minivardump($vars) {
00063                           if (count($vars)==0) { return; }
00064 
00065                           $varCnt=0;
00066                           foreach ($vars as $var) {
00067                                        if (is_string($var)) {
00068                                                     if (strlen($var)>20) {
00069                                                                  echo '<span title="'.h($var).'">\''.h(substr($var,0,20)).'\'...</span>';
00070                                                     } else {
00071                                                                  echo "'".h($var)."'";
00072                                                     }
00073                                        } else if (is_numeric($var)) {
00074                                                     echo h($var);
00075                                        } else {
00076                                                     echo h(kataGetValueInfo($var));
00077                                        }
00078 
00079                                        $varCnt++;
00080                                        if (($varCnt>2) && (count($vars)>2)) {
00081                                                     echo '...';
00082                                                     break;
00083                                        }
00084                                        if($varCnt<count($vars)) {
00085                                                     echo ', ';
00086                                        }
00087                           }
00088              }
00089 
00090              $tdCell = '<td style="border:1px solid red;padding:2px;">';
00091              echo '<table style="min-width:100%;border:1px solid red;color:black;background-color:#e8e8e8;border-collapse:collapse;"><tr>'.$tdCell.'#</td>'.$tdCell.'Function</td>'.$tdCell.'Location</td></tr>';
00092              $cnt= 0;
00093              foreach ($traceArray as $traceLine) {
00094                           $cnt++;
00095 
00096                           echo '<tr>'.$tdCell.'<a name="kataErrorTop'.$cnt.'">#</a></td>'.$tdCell.'<a style="color:black;" href="javascript:var e=document.getElementById(\'kataError'.$cnt.'\');e.style.display=(e.style.display==\'none\'?\'table-row\':\'none\');void(0);">';
00097                           if (isset ($traceLine['class'])) {
00098                                        echo $traceLine['class'].$traceLine['type'].$traceLine['function'].'(';
00099                                        if (isset($traceLine['args'])) {
00100                                                     minivardump($traceLine['args']);
00101 
00102                                        }
00103                                        echo ')';
00104                           } else
00105                                        if (isset ($traceLine['function'])) {
00106                                                     echo $traceLine['function'].'(';
